The purpose of this work was to analyse the

produced in three countries, and to evaluate their

behavior of these briquets, it was developed a " combustion

The following conclusion were obtained from

a - it is possible to apply the combustion
index, which well represents the performance of the
briquets during the combustion process;
b - the highest combustion index was

different characteristics independently of their sources.
Based upon the combustion index the best briquet tested was

identified as EUA1;
